author: hwright
msg: Following up to r37703 by replacing more uses of svn_io_remove_file() with
svn_io_remove_file2().  In all cases, if we clear or ignore the returned error
at the call-site, let the API ignore ENOENT, as well.
Make the switch from svn_io_remove_file() to svn_io_remove_file2().

author: cmpilato
msg: Fix the DAV test failures the right way, by (sometimes) catching and
ignoring errors legitimately thrown from the WC DB layer.
when no dav cache is found.
compatibility with the old WC code.

author: gstein
msg: instead of manually testing the error result.
(svn_wc_transmit_text_deltas2): update to use remove_file2. go ahead and
pass MISSING_OK=TRUE to avoid an error we'd just clear anyways.
(svn_wc__remove_adm_file): update to use remove_file2, and add an
(attempt_deletion): update to remove_file2. we want MISSING_OK=FALSE
since we need to inspect the error value.
(window_handler): update to remove_file2. pass MISSING_OK=TRUE to avoid
an error creation that we'd clear anyways.
(upgrade_format): update to use svn_io_remove_file2(). on calls where
we're going to toss the error, go ahead and pass MISSING_OK=TRUE.
(log_do_rm): update to remove_file2, simplifying the code. throw in an

author: cmpilato
msg: Revert r37693, which made an old-wc-compat exception at the wrong code layer.
